Title: Save the Egg!
Plot: The Wonder Pets receive a call for rescue from an egg and travel to Yellowstone Park. There, they face obstacles such as a mischievous prairie dog and a gushing geyser. As they cope with the unique difficulties of trying to save an egg, they also wonder the whole time just what type of animal the egg contains.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
